name: Rocket Roidmaze
description:
Single Axis of Freedom game starring Jenny Jethamster!

Game jam prototype and winner of the Single Axis of Freedom jam

Collect the 3 fuel cells to reveal the goal and take your new rocket to the next level!

The only controls are moving up and down. Stay on an arrow (zip) to have it take you to the other side. Avoid the electro-cats or you will die. Dying only starts you back at the starting position but you keep your collected fuel cells.

Controls:

Main controls are the up and down arrows or vertical axis joystick/pad controls.

Optionally you can use the B button or Enter when available to start the game faster.

F1 will adjust brightness

F2 will restart the level.

F4 will enable 'blood mode' for the 'Mayan' stages.
